headline: Becton Dickinson Resets Core Focus With Spin Off And $2b Buyback
summary: Becton Dickinson (NYSE:BDX) has completed the spin-off of its Biosciences and Diagnostic Solutions businesses, which are being merged with Waters Corporation. The company has launched a $2 billion accelerated share repurchase program alongside the transaction. Generation Investment Management, co founded by Al Gore, has fully exited its position in Becton Dickinson.
